text: I support the double A grading system. It allows those that are hoping to raise their gpa this quarter to do so. It allows those that are struggling with whatever to focus on their life without the pressure of keeping grades up. Will this lead to grade inflation? Yes, but this isn’t a normal quarter. It isn’t a normal quarter for most university students in the country. Grad schools will be aware of this, and many have already acknowledged that winter/spring 2020 will be handled differently due to the circumstances.
